summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie Review Date: 2014/04/21 Store: Jason David Frank (Actor), Catherine Sutherland (Actor), David Winning (Director), Shuki Levy (Director, Producer, Writer) & 1 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Action, General Product Description: ['The evil space alien Divatox plans to unleash the dark forces of Maligore, a powerful, fiery creature imprisoned inside a volcano on the magical island of Nuiranthias.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '24543089483', 'Director': 'David Winning, Shuki Levy', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, NTSC, Anamorphic, Color, Closed-captioned', 'Run time': '1 hour and 39 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 2, 2003', 'Actors': 'Jason David Frank, Catherine Sutherland, Hilary Shepard Turner, Jon Simanton, Kai Doi', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Shuki Levy, Haim Saban, Jimmy Kent, Jonathan Tzachor', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 5.0), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Writers': 'Shuki Levy, Shell Danielson', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I got this for my grandson along with a big Power Rangers story book also purchased from Amazon. He has nearly worn out the movie according to his mom. If you have a Power Ranger lover in your family, you can't go wrong with this. Review Title: Watched it over and over Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie Review Date: 2014/04/21 Store: Karan Ashley (Actor), Johnny Yong Bosch (Actor), Bryan Spicer (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Action, General Product Description: ['Power up with six incredible teens who out-maneuver and defeat evil everywhere as the Mighty Morphin Power Ranger, But this time the Power Rangers may have met their match, when they face off with the most sinister monster the galaxy has ever seen.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure/Superheroes', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Paul Schrier, Bryan Spicer, Nicholas Bell, Amy Jo Johnson, Johnny Yong Bosch, Paul Freeman, Steve Cardenas, Peta-Maree Rixon, Jason Narvy, Jason David Frank, Karan Ashley, David Yost, Gabrielle Fitzpatrick, Arne Olsen, John KampsPaul Schrier, Bryan Spicer, Nicholas Bell, Amy Jo Johnson, Johnny Yong Bosch, Paul Freeman, Steve Cardenas, Peta-Maree Rixon, Jason Narvy, Jason David Frank, Karan Ashley, David Yost, Gabrielle Fitzpatrick, Arne Olsen, John Kamps See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 35 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '24543089445', 'Director': 'Bryan Spicer', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 35 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 2, 2003', 'Actors': 'Karan Ashley, Johnny Yong Bosch, Steve Cardenas, Jason David Frank, Amy Jo Johnson', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Writers': 'Arne Olsen, John Kamps', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Power Ranger movies I purchased for my grandson. The other was Turbo and he has nearly worn both of them out according to his mom. I also purchased a big book called Power Ranger Storybook Collection to go with the movies, also from Amazon, and it made a great Christmas gift set. If you have a Power Ranger fan in your family, this is a great gift that will keep a little one out of mom's hair for a little while :D Review Title: This was one of two Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/01/19 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Cameron Crowe'], 'Producers': ['Ian Bryce', 'Cameron Crowe'], 'Starring': ['Billly Crudup', 'Frances McDormand'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures Corp.']} Review Text: This was my second viewing. It is one of my favorite all-time movies and is one that I can view multiple times. If you are a rock fan, you’ll love this. It is behind the scenes point of view and I really enjoyed it.

It costs very little to rent, give it a try if you’re a rock fan of any kind. I think you will be glad you did. Review Title: Great movie for rock fans Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/01/19 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kathilynn Phillips'], 'Producers': ['Kathilynn Phillips', 'Austin Haley', 'Jeremy Nocon'], 'Starring': ['Ryan Kennedy', 'Kree Harrison', 'Preston Vanderslice'], 'Studio': ['CreateSpace']} Review Text: Very very good movie. Very dark, which given the subject, meth cooking and addicts lifestyle, is to be expected. It is not a really lavishly produced film, it is an indie movie so there wasn’t millions spent, and it shows, but it is still a good one to see if you are interested in the subject matter. It is grim, pretty much realistic, and does NOT glamorize smoking meth AT ALL. Watching this makes you cringe often, but you can’t stop watching - how will this end?

It is not a feel-good movie with an uplifting, happy ending, it is realistic - things go to shit in a spectacular fashion, although there is a peek of a happy outcome for two of the subjects at least. I personally found it a good movie, and I gotta say, if anyone who watches this has just started using meth, or is toying with the idea, this will squash that idea pretty fast, if the watcher pays attention!

Worth a watch if you can take the subject matter. I find addiction memoirs and movies fascinating, from the realistic ones like this, to Sondra Bullock in 28 days. This was one of the grimmest but riveting ones I have seen. Kind of a poor man’s Trainspotting. Review Title: Good movie about harsh subject matter Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for family-friendly entertainment, particularly content related to Power Rangers, indicating a pattern of purchasing nostalgic and engaging materials for children, likely driven by a desire to provide enjoyable experiences for younger relatives. Consistent ratings of 5.0 for these acquisitions highlight their satisfaction with the entertainment value and suitability for children. 

Additionally, the subject exhibits an inclination towards rock-related cinematic experiences and indie films, appreciating authenticity and depth in storytelling, as reflected in favorable ratings for both genres. They show a tendency to repeatedly engage with these films, indicating strong emotional connections. 

Quality preferences lean towards well-reviewed titles—average ratings above 4.5 suggest they prioritize higher quality productions. Price sensitivity appears moderate; while they appreciate cost-effective rentals, their recurring purchases of DVDs depict a willingness to invest in cherished content. 

Ultimately, this person’s core preferences center on fun, engaging family media with a nostalgic touch, blended with a profound appreciation for relatable and thought-provoking narratives in cinema that challenge perspectives.

target_interaction.title: Great, but very dark, picture of addiction
target_interaction.text: Just as I remembered. This is my second viewing of this and it was as effective this time as the first. Very grim, down and dirty look at addiction, dark and tragic for the majority - just like being a junkie is. It is riveting for me, but if you want the sunshine and rainbows and happily ever after, move on to another movie.
description: Unrepentant Scottish heroin junkies squeeze graphic dark humor out of their own self-destruction in this addicting, award-winning black comedy.
